title: Marsha de Cordova – 2020 Comments on Mandatory Ethnicity Pay Reporting
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Marsha de Cordova, the Shadow Women and Equalities Secretary, on 15 October 2020.
content:
Senior business leaders can see what a difference mandatory ethnicity pay reporting would make to people from Black, Asian and minority ethnic communities.
